body:
Iebele,

Most of the results on

http://mark.technolope.org/pages/rad_bench.html

are from Linux workstations with 2.4 kernels. The fastest
processors for the particular scene tested are Opteron 246s,
though there are few recent tests of P4s to compare with.

Is there anyone out there with a fast P4?

Mark

On Thu, 2 Dec 2004, atelier iebele abel wrote:
replyTo: Subject: [Radiance-general] Intel P4 versus AMD 64 bit processor
subject: [Radiance-general] Intel P4 versus AMD 64 bit processor
